channel.title: Mistex
channel.description:
[CENTER][FONT=Trebuchet MS] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ZfbwbJv.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/q83AapS.png[/img]
[IMG]http://s2.postimg.org/1waex5o10/9j41t1.png[/img] [URL=http://"Http://Www.Mistex.org"]Mistex[/URL]
What makes a PvP server stand out? What makes a PvP server unique from the rest? What makes a PvP server perfect? The answer to these questions are different for each player. So how is it possible to make a server perfect for everyone? It isn't. Mistex is not a server that will be perfect, no it will not make each and every player happy, but what it will be is a server that strives to accommodate each and every player. With toggles for almost everything, fun achievements, flawless combat, unique features, Mistex will be a server that is the closet to being perfect. Unlike many server's that ignore the complaints and requests of players, our staff team will be dedicated to ensure that each player's voice will be heard. Mistex is the next up and coming server that will be the home to many!
[B][SIZE=5]The Idea Behind Mistex[/SIZE][/B]
The idea for Mistex is simple and yet unique. Many successful private servers usually have two or more worlds (World 1 - Eco - World 2 - PvP). It is also common knowledge that eco servers strive more than pvp servers. With this being in mind we have decided to revolutionize this by making two worlds in one. Upon login a player will be able to set all of his combat statistics to the max level, however non-combat skills must be trained. The player will login in a world 1 which is eco, players are able to sell their items, battle fierce bosses, skill, troll, and whatever they please. However, if the player decides to type ::pvp (most likely going to change it from a command) then then the world around them will be all PvP. If another player is in this PvP mode they will be able to battle eachother, while if someone else is in eco they will not be able to interact with eachother.
[B][SIZE=5]Development Team[/SIZE][/B]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/qbBzWn4.png[/img] Play Boy- Server/Client Developer/Project Leader [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/qbBzWn4.png[/img] Daniel - Server Developer [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/qbBzWn4.png[/img] FrostBit3 - Server Developer [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/qbBzWn4.png[/img] Helium - Client Developer [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/qbBzWn4.png[/img] Hank - Lead Forums Developer [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/qbBzWn4.png[/img] Streetwave - Forums Developer
[B][SIZE=5]Server Completion:[/SIZE][/B]
[IMG]http://www.yarntomato.com/percentbarmaker/button.php?barPosition=60&leftFill=%23990000[/img]
[B][SIZE=5]Features:[/SIZE][/B] [/CENTER]
[SIZE=2] Before I go on to listing the features, I feel as I need to give you some background on the base we are using. We started from a wL and now we have basically reworked everything from player updating to how packets are sent and received. Everything has been heavily modified and is now more use friendly for our needs. You can basically say this is a custom framework.
Color codes should be quite obvious but for those who are, slow here is the color code legend:
No color - Haven't started Yellow color - Have started Green color - Completed
[SIZE=2] [SIZE=2][U][COLOR=red]Client:[/COLOR][/U][/SIZE] [COLOR=green]* Fullscreen (fixed, resizeable, & fullscreen)[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]* 508 maps[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]* 602 animations, graphics, characters, and npcs[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]* 634 items[/COLOR] * Xp Counter [COLOR=green]* Context menus not refined to one area[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]* Custom interfaces and tabs[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]* Text Engine[/COLOR] * Ground texture
[SIZE=2][U][COLOR=red]Core:[/COLOR][/U][/SIZE] [COLOR=green]* Netty[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]* Redone player updating[/COLOR]
[SIZE=2][U][COLOR=red]Combat:[/COLOR][/U][/SIZE] [COLOR=yellow]* Melee[/COLOR] * Ranged - Casting animation - Projectile start graphic - Projectile mid graphic - Projectile end graphic - List of all bow ids (xbow and 2h bows separate) - List of all arrow ids (bolts and arrows separate) * Magic
[SIZE=2][U][COLOR=red]Skilling:[/COLOR][/U][/SIZE] [COLOR=green]* Skilling earns a player tickets (easy, medium, hard, and rare) * The skill ticket is given to a player based on their total level - higher total level = more rare skill tickets[/COLOR] * Skill tickets can then be converted into gold pieces - Runecrafting - Construction - Agility - Herblore - Thieving - Crafting - Fletching - Slayer - Hunter - Mining - Smithing - Fishing - Cooking [COLOR=green]- Woodcutting[/COLOR] - Firemaking - Farming
[SIZE=2][U][COLOR=red]Minigames:[/COLOR][/U][/SIZE] [COLOR=yellow]* Fightcaves[/COLOR] * Fightpits * Pest Control * Duel Arena * Barrows
[SIZE=2][U][COLOR=red]Bosses:[/COLOR][/U][/SIZE] * Nex * King Black Dragon * Kalphite Queen * Dagganoth Supreme * Dagganoth Rex * Dagganoth Prime
[SIZE=2][U][COLOR=red]Membership:[/COLOR][/U][/SIZE] * Membership days (being a member allows access to certain areas, beta worlds, and other special features) - 30 days - $5 - 60 days - $10 - 90 days - $15 - Unlimited - $20 * Membership points (can be used to buy special items in game - must be a member to purchase)
[SIZE=2][U][COLOR=red]Miscellaneous:[/COLOR][/U][/SIZE] [COLOR=green]* Teletabs[/COLOR] * Gnomeglider [COLOR=green]* Achievements[/COLOR] * Full emptying system (Jugs, Vials, Buckets, etc) [COLOR=green]* Water Filables added (Buckets, jugs, vials, bowls, waterskins, etc)[/COLOR] * Summoning * Report Abuse * Bank Pins * Loyalty tittles * In game highscores * Drop party room * Grandexchange * Potion mixing * Event bot system * All dupes fixed [COLOR=green]* Better shop system[/COLOR]
[CENTER][SIZE=6][COLOR=red]Media:[/COLOR][/SIZE]
[SIZE=4][COLOR=red]Pictures:[/COLOR][/SIZE]
[SPOILER=Pictures] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/1dMl239.png[/img]
[IMG]http://img545.imageshack.us/img545/3276/m8s5.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/RwSSEWO.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/kmNZ04v.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/BpIYo6f.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/VVGxsMU.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Fo4Ptc7.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Cil1iox.png[/img]
[SPOILER=Maps] [IMG]http://img827.imageshack.us/img827/9187/5wjk.png[/img] [IMG]http://img585.imageshack.us/img585/5868/lpz8.png[/img] [IMG]http://img843.imageshack.us/img843/7154/mp2p.png[/img] [IMG]http://img577.imageshack.us/img577/1214/29hq.png[/img] [IMG]http://img835.imageshack.us/img835/703/w7mc.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/B49EfSL.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/CkE3clz.png[/img] [/SPOILER]
[/SPOILER]
[SIZE=4][COLOR=red]GIFs:[/COLOR][/SIZE]
[SPOILER=GIFs] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/nxn3Jnc.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/NnYZMSa.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/im48EkA.gif[/img] [/SPOILER]
[SIZE=4][COLOR=red]Videos:[/COLOR][/SIZE]
[SPOILER=Videos] Coming soon... [/SPOILER][/CENTER]

item.title: Mistex
item.dc:creator: @RsInFecTion RsInFecTion
item.description:
@RsInFecTion wrote:

[CENTER][FONT=Trebuchet MS]

[URL=http://“Http://Www.Mistex.org”]Mistex[/URL]

What makes a PvP server stand out? What makes a PvP server unique from the rest? What makes a PvP server perfect? The answer to these questions are different for each player. So how is it possible to make a server perfect for everyone? It isn’t. Mistex is not a server that will be perfect, no it will not make each and every player happy, but what it will be is a server that strives to accommodate each and every player. With toggles for almost everything, fun achievements, flawless combat, unique features, Mistex will be a server that is the closet to being perfect. Unlike many server’s that ignore the complaints and requests of players, our staff team will be dedicated to ensure that each player’s voice will be heard. Mistex is the next up and coming server that will be the home to many!

[B][SIZE=5]The Idea Behind Mistex[/SIZE][/B]

The idea for Mistex is simple and yet unique. Many successful private servers usually have two or more worlds (World 1 - Eco - World 2 - PvP). It is also common knowledge that eco servers strive more than pvp servers. With this being in mind we have decided to revolutionize this by making two worlds in one. Upon login a player will be able to set all of his combat statistics to the max level, however non-combat skills must be trained. The player will login in a world 1 which is eco, players are able to sell their items, battle fierce bosses, skill, troll, and whatever they please. However, if the player decides to type ::pvp (most likely going to change it from a command) then then the world around them will be all PvP. If another player is in this PvP mode they will be able to battle eachother, while if someone else is in eco they will not be able to interact with eachother.

[B][SIZE=5]Development Team[/SIZE][/B]

Play Boy- Server/Client Developer/Project Leader
Daniel - Server Developer
FrostBit3 - Server Developer
Helium - Client Developer
Hank - Lead Forums Developer
Streetwave - Forums Developer

[B][SIZE=5]Server Completion:[/SIZE][/B]

[B][SIZE=5]Features:[/SIZE][/B]
[/CENTER]

[SIZE=2]
Before I go on to listing the features, I feel as I need to give you some background on the base we are using. We started from a wL and now we have basically reworked everything from player updating to how packets are sent and received. Everything has been heavily modified and is now more use friendly for our needs. You can basically say this is a custom framework.

Color codes should be quite obvious but for those who are, slow here is the color code legend:

No color - Haven’t started
Yellow color - Have started
Green color - Completed

[SIZE=2]
[SIZE=2][U][COLOR=red]Client:[/COLOR][/U][/SIZE]
[COLOR=green]* Fullscreen (fixed, resizeable, & fullscreen)[/COLOR]
[COLOR=green]* 508 maps[/COLOR]
[COLOR=green]* 602 animations, graphics, characters, and npcs[/COLOR]
[COLOR=green]* 634 items[/COLOR]

  • Xp Counter
    [COLOR=green]* Context menus not refined to one area[/COLOR]
    [COLOR=green]* Custom interfaces and tabs[/COLOR]
    [COLOR=green]* Text Engine[/COLOR]
  • Ground texture

[SIZE=2][U][COLOR=red]Core:[/COLOR][/U][/SIZE]
[COLOR=green]* Netty[/COLOR]
[COLOR=green]* Redone player updating[/COLOR]

[SIZE=2][U][COLOR=red]Combat:[/COLOR][/U][/SIZE]
[COLOR=yellow]* Melee[/COLOR]

  • Ranged
  • Casting animation
  • Projectile start graphic
  • Projectile mid graphic
  • Projectile end graphic
  • List of all bow ids (xbow and 2h bows separate)
  • List of all arrow ids (bolts and arrows separate)
  • Magic

[SIZE=2][U][COLOR=red]Skilling:[/COLOR][/U][/SIZE]
[COLOR=green]* Skilling earns a player tickets (easy, medium, hard, and rare)

  • The skill ticket is given to a player based on their total level - higher total level = more rare skill tickets[/COLOR]
  • Skill tickets can then be converted into gold pieces
  • Runecrafting
  • Construction
  • Agility
  • Herblore
  • Thieving
  • Crafting
  • Fletching
  • Slayer
  • Hunter
  • Mining
  • Smithing
  • Fishing
  • Cooking
    [COLOR=green]- Woodcutting[/COLOR]
  • Firemaking
  • Farming

[SIZE=2][U][COLOR=red]Minigames:[/COLOR][/U][/SIZE]
[COLOR=yellow]* Fightcaves[/COLOR]

  • Fightpits
  • Pest Control
  • Duel Arena
  • Barrows

[SIZE=2][U][COLOR=red]Bosses:[/COLOR][/U][/SIZE]

  • Nex
  • King Black Dragon
  • Kalphite Queen
  • Dagganoth Supreme
  • Dagganoth Rex
  • Dagganoth Prime

[SIZE=2][U][COLOR=red]Membership:[/COLOR][/U][/SIZE]

  • Membership days (being a member allows access to certain areas, beta worlds, and other special features)
    • 30 days - $5
    • 60 days - $10
    • 90 days - $15
    • Unlimited - $20
  • Membership points (can be used to buy special items in game - must be a member to purchase)

[SIZE=2][U][COLOR=red]Miscellaneous:[/COLOR][/U][/SIZE]
[COLOR=green]* Teletabs[/COLOR]

  • Gnomeglider
    [COLOR=green]* Achievements[/COLOR]
  • Full emptying system (Jugs, Vials, Buckets, etc)
    [COLOR=green]* Water Filables added (Buckets, jugs, vials, bowls, waterskins, etc)[/COLOR]
  • Summoning
  • Report Abuse
  • Bank Pins
  • Loyalty tittles
  • In game highscores
  • Drop party room
  • Grandexchange
  • Potion mixing
  • Event bot system
  • All dupes fixed
    [COLOR=green]* Better shop system[/COLOR]
